          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az emberré válás</string>
            <string language="en">Evolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evolução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέλιξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evolución</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az emberré válás okai, folyamata, az egyes emberelődök</string>
            <string language="en">The reasons and the process of the evolution, on certain human ancestors </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">homo sapiens,  homo habilis,  homo erectus,  rassz,  </string>
            <string language="en">homo sapiens,  homo habilis,  homo erectus,  race </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gründe und der Prozeß der Entwicklung, auf 
bestimmten menschlichen Vorfahren</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les raisons et le processus de l'évolution, sur 
certains ancêtres humains</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As razões e o processo da evolução, em 
determinados antepassados humanos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I motivi ed il processo dello sviluppo, sugli 
antenati umani sicuri</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι λόγοι και η διαδικασία της εξέλιξης, σε ορισμένους 
ανθρώπινους προγόνους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las razones y el proceso de la evolución, en 
ciertos antepasados humanos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Homo sapiens, Homo habilis, Homo erectus, Rennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sapiens de homo, habilis de homo, erectus de homo, 
course</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sapiens de homo, habilis de homo, erectus de homo, raça</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sapiens di homo, habilis di homo, erectus di homo, 
corsa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">homo sapiens, habilis homo, erectus homo, 
φυλή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sapiens de homo, habilis de homo, erectus de homo, raza</string>
